title: Pharmaceutical sector growth worldwide 2017 - 2030 , by country
summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Growth in percentage in each Country on the y axis.
Country India has the highest Growth in percentage and Japan has the lowest Growth in percentage.
The difference of Growth in percentage between the highest and lowest Country is 115.0.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Growth in percentage for 20 number of Countrys.
The maximum Growth in percentage 232.0 is found at Country India and the minimum is found at Japan where Growth in percentage is 117.0.
The highest Country India has 115.0 more Growth in percentage than the lowest Country Japan.
